examples: Prosecution for a first minor offence rarely leads to imprisonment.
El enjuiciamiento por un primer delito menor rara vez conduce al encarcelamiento.
He threatened to bring a private prosecution against the doctor.
Amenazó con iniciar un proceso privado contra el médico.
He was a witness for the prosecution.
The prosecution has/have failed to prove its/their case.
La fiscalía no ha podido probar su caso.
